title: AnswerThis | Best AI research assistant
introduction: AnswerThis is an AI-driven platform designed to streamline research by providing comprehensive summaries based on verified research sources. Users can upload papers, inquire about specific topics, and receive detailed, research-backed explanations with direct citations.
features: Access to 200 million credible research sources

faqs.question: How does AnswerThis streamline the research process?
faqs.answer: AnswerThis simplifies research by providing comprehensive literature reviews, detailed citations, and organized information from 200 million credible sources.

faqs.question: What makes AnswerThis different from reading abstracts or simply skimming the paper?
faqs.answer: AnswerThis offers AI-driven, scholarly answers that provide a holistic, research-backed explanation along with direct citations and summaries for every paper used.

faqs.question: How does the pricing model for AnswerThis work?
faqs.answer: AnswerThis offers a free Starter Plan and a Pro Plan for $10 per month. There is also an option for custom Institutional Access plans.

faqs.question: Who is the team behind AnswerThis?
faqs.answer: The team behind AnswerThis is dedicated to providing seamless research experiences by leveraging AI technology to deliver clear and concise answers to important research questions.
